actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to provide for the withholding of State and city income taxes from the pay of members of the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Authorizes the withholding of State and city income taxes from the pay of members of the Armed Forces. Sets forth the conditions to be met by governmental units withholding taxes under this Act. (Adds 37 U.S.C. 1010).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to provide for the withholding of State and city income taxes from the pay of members of the Armed Forces.
